Typealiases.html#/s:5Steem0A7Codablea.name: SteemCodable
Typealiases.html#/s:5Steem0A7Codablea.abstract: A type that is decodable to Steem binary format as well as JSON encodable and decodable.

Structs/SteemURL/CallbackContext.html#/s.name: signature
Structs/SteemURL/CallbackContext.html#/s.abstract: The signature that the transaction was signed with.

Structs/SteemURL/CallbackContext.html#/s.name: id
Structs/SteemURL/CallbackContext.html#/s.abstract: Transaction hash, should only be set if the transaction was broadcast.

Structs/SteemURL/CallbackContext.html#/s.name: blockNum
Structs/SteemURL/CallbackContext.html#/s.abstract: Block number transaction was included in, should only be set if the transaction was broadcast.

Structs/SteemURL/CallbackContext.html#/s.name: txNum
Structs/SteemURL/CallbackContext.html#/s.abstract: Transaction index in block, should only be set if the transaction was broadcast.

Structs/SteemURL/ResolveOptions.html#/s:.name: refBlockNum
Structs/SteemURL/ResolveOptions.html#/s:.abstract: The ref block number used to fill in the __ref_block_num placeholder.

Structs/SteemURL/ResolveOptions.html#/s:.name: refBlockPrefix
Structs/SteemURL/ResolveOptions.html#/s:.abstract: The ref block prefix used to fill in the __ref_block_prefix placeholder.

Structs/SteemURL/ResolveOptions.html#/s:.name: expiration
Structs/SteemURL/ResolveOptions.html#/s:.abstract: The date string used to fill in the __expiration placeholder.

Structs/SteemURL/ResolveOptions.html#/s:.name: signers
Structs/SteemURL/ResolveOptions.html#/s:.abstract: List of account names available as signers.

Structs/SteemURL/ResolveOptions.html#/s:.name: preferredSigner
Structs/SteemURL/ResolveOptions.html#/s:.abstract: Preferred signer if none is explicitly set in params.

Structs/SteemURL.html#/s:5Steem0A3URLVA2.name: init(type:params:payload:)
Structs/SteemURL.html#/s:5Steem0A3URLVA2.abstract: Create a new SteemURL from a custom payload.

Structs/SteemURL.html#/s:5Steem0A3URLVAC.name: init(string:)
Structs/SteemURL.html#/s:5Steem0A3URLVAC.abstract: Create a new SteemURL from a string

Structs/SteemURL.html#/s:5Steem0A3URLVAC.name: init(url:)
Structs/SteemURL.html#/s:5Steem0A3URLVAC.abstract: Create a new SteemURL from a URL.

Structs/SteemURL.html#/s:5Steem0A3URLVAC.name: init(urlComponents:)
Structs/SteemURL.html#/s:5Steem0A3URLVAC.abstract: Create a new SteemURL from a set of url components.

Structs/SteemURL.html#/s:5Steem0A3URLVAC.name: init(transaction:params:)
Structs/SteemURL.html#/s:5Steem0A3URLVAC.abstract: Create a new SteemURL with a transaction, steem://sign/tx/...

Structs/SteemURL.html#/s:5Steem0A3URLVAC.name: init(operation:params:)
Structs/SteemURL.html#/s:5Steem0A3URLVAC.abstract: Create a new SteemURL with an operation, steem://sign/op/...

Structs/SteemURL.html#/s:5Steem0A3URLVAC.name: init(operations:params:)
Structs/SteemURL.html#/s:5Steem0A3URLVAC.abstract: Create a new SteemURL with several operations, steem://sign/ops/...

Structs/SteemURL/ResolveOptions.html.name: ResolveOptions
Structs/SteemURL/ResolveOptions.html.abstract: Options used to resolve a signing url to a signer and transaction.

Structs/SteemURL.html#/s:5Steem0A3URLV7r.name: resolve(with:)
Structs/SteemURL.html#/s:5Steem0A3URLV7r.abstract: Resolve this url to a signer and transaction.

Structs/SteemURL/CallbackContext.html.name: CallbackContext
Structs/SteemURL/CallbackContext.html.abstract: Used to resolve callback urls, should be populated after signed txn has been broadcast.

Structs/Signature.html#/s:5Steem9Signatu.name: init(_:)
Structs/Signature.html#/s:5Steem9Signatu.abstract: Create a new signature from a byte buffer.

Structs/Signature.html#/s:5Steem9Signatu.name: init(_:)
Structs/Signature.html#/s:5Steem9Signatu.abstract: Create a new signature from a hex encoded string.

Structs/Signature.html#/s:5Steem9Signatu.name: recover(message:prefix:)
Structs/Signature.html#/s:5Steem9Signatu.abstract: Recover public key used to sign the message.

Structs/PublicKey.html#/s:5Steem9PublicK.name: init(_:)
Structs/PublicKey.html#/s:5Steem9PublicK.abstract: Create a new PublicKey instance from a Steem public key address.

Structs/PrivateKey.html#/s:5Steem10Priva.name: init(_:)
Structs/PrivateKey.html#/s:5Steem10Priva.abstract: Create a new public key instance from a byte buffer.

Structs/PrivateKey.html#/s:5Steem10Priva.name: init(_:)
Structs/PrivateKey.html#/s:5Steem10Priva.abstract: Create a new public key instance from a WIF-encoded string.

Structs/PrivateKey.html#/s:5Steem10Priva.name: createPublic(prefix:)
Structs/PrivateKey.html#/s:5Steem10Priva.abstract: Derive the public key for this private key.

Structs/PrivateKey.html#/s:5Steem10Priva.name: wif
Structs/PrivateKey.html#/s:5Steem10Priva.abstract: WIF-encoded string representation of this private key.

Structs/Operation/WithdrawVesting.html#/.name: vestingShares
Structs/Operation/WithdrawVesting.html#/.abstract: Amount that is powered down, must be VESTS.

Structs/Operation/TransferToVesting.html.name: amount
Structs/Operation/TransferToVesting.html.abstract: Amount to power up, must be STEEM.

Structs/Operation/Comment.html#/s:5Steem.name: parentAuthor
Structs/Operation/Comment.html#/s:5Steem.abstract: The parent content author, left blank for top level posts.

Structs/Operation/Comment.html#/s:5Steem.name: parentPermlink
Structs/Operation/Comment.html#/s:5Steem.abstract: The parent content permalink, left blank for top level posts.

Structs/Operation/Comment.html#/s:5Steem.name: author
Structs/Operation/Comment.html#/s:5Steem.abstract: The account name of the post creator.

Structs/Operation/Vote.html#/s:5Steem9Op.name: voter
Structs/Operation/Vote.html#/s:5Steem9Op.abstract: The account that is casting the vote.

Structs/Operation/Vote.html#/s:5Steem9Op.name: author
Structs/Operation/Vote.html#/s:5Steem9Op.abstract: The account name that is receieving the vote.

Structs/Operation/Vote.html#/s:5Steem9Op.name: weight
Structs/Operation/Vote.html#/s:5Steem9Op.abstract: The vote weight. 100% = 10000. A negative value is a flag.

Structs/Operation/Transfer.html.name: Transfer
Structs/Operation/Transfer.html.abstract: Transfers assets from one account to another.

Structs/Operation/LimitOrderCreate.html.name: LimitOrderCreate
Structs/Operation/LimitOrderCreate.html.abstract: This operation creates a limit order and matches it against existing open orders.

Structs/Operation/LimitOrderCancel.html.name: LimitOrderCancel
Structs/Operation/LimitOrderCancel.html.abstract: Cancels an order and returns the balance to owner.

Structs/Operation/ReportOverProduction.h.name: ReportOverProduction
Structs/Operation/ReportOverProduction.h.abstract: Reports a producer who signs two blocks at the same time.

Structs/Operation/LimitOrderCreate2.html.name: LimitOrderCreate2
Structs/Operation/LimitOrderCreate2.html.abstract: Creates a limit order using a exchange price.

Structs/Operation.html#/s:5Steem9Operati.name: Unknown
Structs/Operation.html#/s:5Steem9Operati.abstract: Unknown operation, seen if the decoder encounters operation which has no type defined.

Structs/RequestParams.html#/s:5Steem13Re.name: init(_:)
Structs/RequestParams.html#/s:5Steem13Re.abstract: Create a new set of named params.

Structs/RequestParams.html#/s:5Steem13Re.name: init(_:)
Structs/RequestParams.html#/s:5Steem13Re.abstract: Create a new set of ordered params.

Structs/Authority/Auth.html.name: Auth
Structs/Authority/Auth.html.abstract: A type representing a key or account auth and its weight.

Structs/Asset/Symbol.html.name: Symbol
Structs/Asset/Symbol.html.abstract: Asset symbol type, containing the symbol name and precision.

Structs/Asset.html#/s:5Steem5AssetVACSgS.name: init(_:)
Structs/Asset.html#/s:5Steem5AssetVACSgS.abstract: Create a new Asset from a string representation.

Structs/Price.html.name: Price
Structs/Price.html.abstract: Type representing a quotation of the relative value of asset against another asset.

Structs/BlockHeader.html.name: BlockHeader
Structs/BlockHeader.html.abstract: A type representing a Steem block header.

Structs/SignedBlockHeader.html.name: SignedBlockHeader
Structs/SignedBlockHeader.html.abstract: A type representing a signed Steem block header.

Structs/RequestParams.html.name: RequestParams
Structs/RequestParams.html.abstract: Request parameter helper type. Can wrap any Encodable as set of params, either keyed by name or indexed.

Protocols.html#/s:5Steem13OperationTypeP.name: OperationType
Protocols.html#/s:5Steem13OperationTypeP.abstract: A type that represents a operation on the Steem blockchain.

Protocols/SteemEncodable.html.name: SteemEncodable
Protocols/SteemEncodable.html.abstract: A type that can be encoded into Steem binary wire format.

Classes/SteemEncoder/Error.html#/s:5Stee.name: typeNotConformingToSteemEncodable
Classes/SteemEncoder/Error.html#/s:5Stee.abstract: Thrown if encoder encounters a type that is not conforming to SteemEncodable.

Classes/SteemEncoder/Error.html#/s:5Stee.name: typeNotConformingToEncodable
Classes/SteemEncoder/Error.html#/s:5Stee.abstract: Thrown if encoder encounters a type that is not confirming to Encodable.

Classes/SteemEncoder.html#/s:5Steem0A7En.name: encode(_:)
Classes/SteemEncoder.html#/s:5Steem0A7En.abstract: Convenience for creating an encoder, encoding a value and returning the data.

Classes/Client/Error.html#/s:5Steem6Clie.name: invalidResponse
Classes/Client/Error.html#/s:5Steem6Clie.abstract: Server didn’t respond with a valid JSON-RPC 2.0 response.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
